name: Tibetan Singing Bowls | VR Relaxation | 360° Video | 6K/2D
detailed_description:
Steam 360 Video Beta

This video is part of the Steam 360 Video beta program. After installing the Steam 360 Video tool in the Steam Client, you can watch this video in a supported Virtual Reality headset or on your desktop monitor. More information can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871#360">Steam 360 Video FAQ.


Internet Speed Requirement

Please note that you will need a 50Mbps+ internet connection to stream this 360 Video VR Experience smoothly


Computer Requirements

To play this high-resolution 6K 360° VR Video smoothly you need a 'VR-Ready' computer with Windows 10 as a minimum requirement. If you are unsure, please get in contact with us with the specifications of your PC before purchasing.


Video Quality Settings

To change the video quality, press the up and down arrows on your keyboard to change to higher and lower resolutions or press 'A' for automatic adjustment.


About the Video

TIBETAN SINGING BOWLS | VR RELAXATION | 360° VIDEO | 6K/2D MONOSCOPIC | 3DOF


Immerse yourself in the healing power of Tibetan Singing Bowl Sound Therapy. Your guide is Chrystal Nathal, a well-known sound healer who has brought relief to people the world over. Originally recorded to help young bone marrow transplant patients cope with isolation in sterile recovery rooms, this therapeutic sound session is now available to you in the privacy of your home.  Feel your body resonate with harmonious vibrations emanating from handcrafted Tibetan singing bowls. Soothe a restless mind, assuage an anxious spirit and bring your body and mind back to tuneful equilibrium.

INCLUDES
- Music
- Nature Sounds

We hope you enjoy this Tibetan Singing Bowls VR Relaxation Experience as much as the thousands of happy users on Steam and other platforms. If you experience any issues or have any feedback on how we can improve our VR Experiences to better suit your needs, please get in contact via the support link to our website.

ABOUT SPHAERES VR
Get away from the stress and noise of everyday life and delve into an alternate reality where you are free to relax, enjoy nature, meditate and travel in immersive 360° video experiences
